cause.description:
Underage drinkers unite!!! We need to fight for our rights to get drunk or have a casual beer every now and again. Don't be shy to donate, it goes to an important cause to make it so drug offenders in Compton can go to college and fix thier lives up.
1. We have our rights to screw up our lives if we want to...
cause.mission: Lower the legal age to consume and purchase alcohol.
cause.name: Drunken Minors
